name: ChessPy
description:
Important Note! The game is playable, but to use the neural-network-bot and neural network command line interface, you have to download Cuda environment and cDNN.

ChessPy is a multifunctional chess engine:
 - You can play against other players or bots
 - You can train neural networks used for the bot
The game function is self explanatory,  the neural network training bit is a tad more complicated.
